mapper.select: SELECT sk.mykill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.mykill_id "mykill.mykill_id", s.name "mykill.name", s.number "mykill.number", s.start_time "mykill.start_time", s.end_time "mykill.end_time", s.create_time "mykill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN mykill s ON sk.mykill_id=s.mykill_id WHERE sk.mykill_id=#{mykillId} and sk.user_phone=#{userPhone}
